csw.services.ccs

Interface AssemblyController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAssemblyController, AssemblyExample, JAssemblyController, TromboneAssembly, TromboneAssembly

    public interface AssemblyController
    Base trait for an assembly controller actor that reacts immediately to SetupConfigArg messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  AssemblyController.AssemblyControllerMessage
      Base trait of all received messages
      static class  AssemblyController.OneWay
      Message to submit a oneway config to the assembly.
      static class  AssemblyController.OneWay$ 
      static class  AssemblyController.Submit
      Message to submit a configuration to the assembly.
      static class  AssemblyController.Submit$

      • setup

        scala.collection.immutable.List<Validation.Validation> setup(Configurations.SetupConfigArg configArg,
                                                             scala.Option<akka.actor.ActorRef> replyTo)
        Called to process the setup config and reply to the given actor with the command status.

        Parameters:
        configArg - contains a list of setup configurations
        replyTo - if defined, the actor that should receive the final command status.
        Returns:
        a validation object that indicates if the received config is valid
